definitions.definition: The extreme end of something, especially when pointed; e.g. the sharp end of a pencil. [from 15th c.]
A piece of metal, fabric or other material used to cover the top of something for protection, utility or decoration. [from 15th c.]
examples: a tip for an umbrella, a shoe, a gas burner, etc.

definitions.definition: ( music ) The end of a bow of a stringed instrument that is not held.
( chiefly in the plural ) A small piece of meat.
examples: chicken tips over rice , pork tips , marinated alligator tips

definitions.definition: A piece of stiffened lining pasted on the inside of a hat crown .
A thin, boarded brush made of camel 's hair , used by gilders in lifting gold leaf .
Synonym of eartip ( “ part of earbuds ” ) .

main_definition: The extreme end of something, especially when pointed; e.g. the sharp end of a pencil. [from 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: A piece of metal, fabric or other material used to cover the top of something for protection, utility or decoration. [from 15th c.]
( music ) The end of a bow of a stringed instrument that is not held.
( chiefly in the plural ) A small piece of meat.
A piece of stiffened lining pasted on the inside of a hat crown .
A thin, boarded brush made of camel 's hair , used by gilders in lifting gold leaf .
Synonym of eartip ( “ part of earbuds ” ) .

definitions.definition: ( skittles , obsolete ) The knocking over of a skittle . [from 17th c.]
An act of tipping up or tilting. [from 19th c.]
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth ) An area or a place for dumping something, such as rubbish or refuse, as from a mine; a heap ( see tipple ); a dump . [from 19th c.]
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth ) Rubbish thrown from a quarry .
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , by extension ) A recycling centre .
( colloquial ) A very untidy place. [from 20th c.]
The act of deflecting with one's fingers, especially the fingertips
A tram for expeditiously transferring coal .

main_definition: ( skittles , obsolete ) The knocking over of a skittle . [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: An act of tipping up or tilting. [from 19th c.]
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth ) An area or a place for dumping something, such as rubbish or refuse, as from a mine; a heap ( see tipple ); a dump . [from 19th c.]
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth ) Rubbish thrown from a quarry .
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , by extension ) A recycling centre .
( colloquial ) A very untidy place. [from 20th c.]
The act of deflecting with one's fingers, especially the fingertips
A tram for expeditiously transferring coal .

definitions.definition: ( now rare ) A light blow or tap . [from late 16th c.]

main_definition: ( now rare ) A light blow or tap . [from late 16th c.]

definitions.definition: A gratuity ; a small amount of money left for a bartender , waiter , taxi driver or other servant as a token of appreciation. [from mid-18th c.]
examples: Workers in the American service industry usually depend on tips to even make minimum wage .

main_definition: A gratuity ; a small amount of money left for a bartender , waiter , taxi driver or other servant as a token of appreciation. [from mid-18th c.]

definitions.definition: A piece of private or secret information, especially imparted by someone with expert knowledge about sporting odds, business performance etc. [from mid-19th c.]
A piece of advice.
( Australia ) A prediction of the winning team in a football game by a participant in a footy tipping competition.
( Australia ) A prediction about the outcome of something.

main_definition: A piece of private or secret information, especially imparted by someone with expert knowledge about sporting odds, business performance etc. [from mid-19th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( Australia ) A prediction of the winning team in a football game by a participant in a footy tipping competition.
( Australia ) A prediction about the outcome of something.

definitions.definition: A kick or phase ; one's current habits or behaviour.
A particular arena or sphere of interest; a front .

main_definition: ( African-American Vernacular ) A kick or phase ; one's current habits or behaviour.
secondary_definitions: ( African-American Vernacular ) A particular arena or sphere of interest; a front .
